We are the Berlin chapter of the CocoaHeads community. We meet once every month, usually every 3rd Wednesday of the month, and talk about iOS and OS X development.

If you're into Cocoa and in Berlin, come by and say Hi!

Meetup Twitter Vimeo Groups

Are you interested in giving a talk or hosting a meeting?

Next Meeting

Past talks can be found on our Meetup page in the archive.

Location

To literally come around in Berlin's tech scene, CocoaHeads enjoys having its meetup in a different place every month.

We are looking for venues supporting at least 70 people.

Contact the team if you would like to be a host!

Drinks and Food

Drinks are usually provided by the hosting company of the event.

Want to be the food ninja of one of the events? Contact the team about sponsoring foods or drinks!
